title: Create Public Booking Page ($username.$sessionId)
description:
Build a complete booking page similar to cal.com where mentors/consultants can receive bookings from mentees.

## Objective
Create a public booking page at /p.. that allows mentees to book consultation sessions with mentors/consultants.

## Requirements
- Display session details: title, description, pricing (Free/Paid/Commitment fee), duration (15/30/45 mins), location (Zoom/GMeet), timezone
- Interactive calendar for date selection
- Time slot selection for chosen date
- Modal booking form (Name, Email, Question)
- Proper timezone handling
- Responsive design

## Technical Stack
- TanStack Start file-based routing
- date-fns for date manipulation
- react-day-picker (existing UI calendar component)
- react-hook-form + zod for forms
- Tailwind CSS for styling

title: Task 1: Set up Route Structure
description:
Create the dynamic route file and basic page structure:

## Deliverables
- Create src/routes/p...tsx
- Set up route parameters handling (username, sessionId)
- Implement basic page layout structure
- Add loading and error states
- Follow TanStack Start file-based routing patterns

## Implementation Notes
- Use createFileRoute from @tanstack/react-router
- Set up proper TypeScript types for route params
- Add basic container and card layout

title: Task 2: Implement Session Configuration Component
description:
Create component to display session details:

## Deliverables
- Build SessionInfo component
- Display session title (e.g., "Consultation of xxx", "Mentorship for hackathon")
- Show description of the booking
- Display pricing type: Free / Paid / Free with commitment fee
- Show duration options: 15 mins, 30 mins, 45 mins
- Display location: Zoom, Google Meet, etc.
- Show timezone: Europe/Dublin, Asia/Jakarta, etc.
- Use existing UI components (Card, Badge, etc.)

## Implementation Notes
- Use @/components/ui/card for layout
- Use Badge component for pricing type
- Format duration and location display nicely
- Make it responsive

title: Task 3: Integrate Calendar Component
description:
Implement calendar view for date selection:

## Deliverables
- Use existing @/components/ui/calendar (react-day-picker)
- Implement calendar view for date selection
- Highlight available dates
- Disable past dates and unavailable dates
- Show calendar with proper timezone handling
- Handle date selection state
- Add calendar section to booking page

## Implementation Notes
- Import Calendar from @/components/ui/calendar
- Configure mode="single" for single date selection
- Add disabled prop to prevent past dates
- Store selected date in component state
- Show selected date prominently

title: Task 4: Build Time Slot Selection
description:
Display available times for selected date:

## Deliverables
- Show available times for selected date
- Display time slots in "Fri, Jun 24" format using date-fns
- Filter time slots based on session duration
- Indicate unavailable/busy slots (disabled state)
- Handle timezone conversion for display
- Create TimeSlotList component
- Add click handlers for time slot selection

## Implementation Notes
- Use date-fns format() for date formatting
- Generate time slots based on business hours
- Account for session duration in slot calculation
- Show time slots in user's local timezone
- Style available vs unavailable slots differently

title: Task 5: Create Booking Modal Form
description:
Build modal with booking form:

## Deliverables
- Build modal component using @/components/ui/dialog
- Create form with validation using react-hook-form + zod
- Form fields:
  - Name (required)
  - Email (required, email validation)
  - Question (textarea, optional)
- Add form submission handling
- Display success/error states
- Integrate with booking flow

## Implementation Notes
- Use Dialog component from @/components/ui/dialog
- Create Zod schema for validation
- Use react-hook-form with zodResolver
- Show loading state during submission
- Display confirmation message on success
- Close modal after successful booking

title: Task 6: Implement Date/Time Utilities
description:
Create utility functions for date and time handling:

## Deliverables
- Create date/time utility functions using date-fns
- Date formatting helpers (e.g., "Fri, Jun 24")
- Time slot generation functions
- Timezone conversion utilities
- Duration calculation helpers
- Availability logic functions

## Implementation Notes
- Create src/lib/booking-utils.ts
- Export formatDate, generateTimeSlots, convertTimezone, etc.
- Use date-fns format(), parse(), addMinutes(), etc.
- Handle different timezone conversions
- Create helper to check slot availability
- Write comprehensive JSDoc comments

title: Task 7: Add Styling and Polish
description:
Polish the UI with proper styling:

## Deliverables
- Style all components with Tailwind CSS
- Add loading states and skeleton screens
- Implement responsive design (mobile-first)
- Add hover states and animations
- Ensure accessibility (a11y) compliance
- Polish visual hierarchy
- Add transitions and micro-interactions

## Implementation Notes
- Use Tailwind classes for styling
- Add loading skeleton for calendar
- Style time slots with hover effects
- Ensure proper color contrast for a11y
- Test on mobile and desktop
- Add focus states for keyboard navigation
- Use existing design system colors

description:
Add mock data for testing and demonstration:

## Implementation Notes
